description.value:
You Interact to sheathe your weapon and enter @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}. Until the end of your turn, your next @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D6a4phlAxmixy2lo]{Hakaze} gains the following effect on a hit:

Your Hakaze becomes indetectable and you can delay its effects while your weapon is drawn. The victim must attempt a @Check[perception|against:class] check to see it was hit. Other creatures looking at you can make the same check, but do so with a -2 circumstance penalty. You can delay the damage dealt this way for 10 minutes or until you sheathe your samurai weapon, whichever comes first. This duration is extended to 1 hour if you're legendary in stealth.
